name: Borbekova Aruzhan
text: CheckAI provides clear analysis of test results and helpful lifestyle tips. The website works well and shows clinic options clearly. It would be perfect with home service booking and a mobile app. Great tool overall, just needs a couple extra features!

name: Tolegenova Zhanymgul
text: Very convenient website—I quickly found the clinic I needed and booked effortlessly! Everything worked perfectly, from search to confirmation. Highly recommend!

name: Ardak Aruzhan
text: I’m truly impressed by the CheckAI service! It doesn’t just throw raw numbers from lab tests at you—it provides a detailed breakdown with clear explanations. For example, if your hemoglobin is slightly low, the AI doesn’t alarm you but calmly suggests: ‘This might be due to an iron deficiency—try adding buckwheat or pomegranate juice to your diet.
